Title: Last Night in Soho
Actors: Thomasin McKenzie, Anya Taylor-Joy, Matt Smith
Plot: Aspiring fashion designer Eloise is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s, where she encounters dazzling wannabe singer Sandie. But the glamour is not as it seems, and the dreams of the past crack and splinter into something darker.
Awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA 23 wins & 75 nominations total
